object.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1303 (1670 with comment) chars
k=screen j=math Q=input O=table.insert b=Q.getNumber m=j.sin q=j.cos function ai(_,e,a)return{_=_,e=e,a=a}end function Z(C,z)return{_=C._+z._,e=C.e+z.e,a=C.a+z.a}end function N(s)return s*j.pi*2 end function aj(_,r,A)return j.min(j.max(_,r),A)end function al(_,r,R,A,ah)return aj((_-r)/(A-r),0,1)*(ah-R)+R end function af(H,K,F)local p,n=q(H),m(H)local t,i=q(K),m(K)local l,h=q(F),m(F)return{{t*l,n*i*l-p*h,p*i*l+n*h},{t*h,n*i*h+p*l,p*i*h-n*l},{-i,n*t,p*t}}end function ak(D,w)return ab(function(f)return D[f][1]*w._+D[f][2]*w.e+D[f][3]*w.a end)end function ab(x)return{_=x(1),e=x(2),a=x(3)}end u=0 J=150 aa=.75 o={}g={}v=1 function onTick()local o={}g=T()v=b(28)for f=0,7 do local E=f*4 if Q.getBool(f+1)then local P=b(E+1)local L=N(b(E+2))local I=N(b(E+3))local d=P*q(I)local B=ai(d*m(L),P*m(I),d*q(L))O(o,{c=g:ad(B),s=u})end end local M={}for Y,d in ipairs(o)do if d.s+J<u then O(M,d)end end o=M u=u+1 end function T()local c={_=b(4),e=b(8),a=b(12)}local W,X,U=b(16),b(20),b(24)local y=af(W,X,U)return{c=c,y=y,ad=function(G,B)return Z(ak(G.y,B),G.c)end}end function onDraw()local ae,S=k.getWidth(),k.getHeight()k.drawMap(g.c._,g.c.a,v)for Y,d in pairs(o)do local ag,V=map.mapToScreen(g.c._,g.c.a,v,ae,S,d.c._,d.c.a)local ac=al(d.s,0,1,J,1-aa)k.setColor(255,0,255,ac*255)k.drawRectF(ag,V,1,1)end end

c1.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1303 (1670 with comment) chars
k=screen j=math Q=input O=table.insert b=Q.getNumber m=j.sin q=j.cos function ai(_,e,a)return{_=_,e=e,a=a}end function Z(C,z)return{_=C._+z._,e=C.e+z.e,a=C.a+z.a}end function N(s)return s*j.pi*2 end function aj(_,r,A)return j.min(j.max(_,r),A)end function al(_,r,R,A,ah)return aj((_-r)/(A-r),0,1)*(ah-R)+R end function af(H,K,F)local p,n=q(H),m(H)local t,i=q(K),m(K)local l,h=q(F),m(F)return{{t*l,n*i*l-p*h,p*i*l+n*h},{t*h,n*i*h+p*l,p*i*h-n*l},{-i,n*t,p*t}}end function ak(D,w)return ab(function(f)return D[f][1]*w._+D[f][2]*w.e+D[f][3]*w.a end)end function ab(x)return{_=x(1),e=x(2),a=x(3)}end u=0 J=150 aa=.75 o={}g={}v=1 function onTick()local o={}g=T()v=b(28)for f=0,7 do local E=f*4 if Q.getBool(f+1)then local P=b(E+1)local L=N(b(E+2))local I=N(b(E+3))local d=P*q(I)local B=ai(d*m(L),P*m(I),d*q(L))O(o,{c=g:ad(B),s=u})end end local M={}for Y,d in ipairs(o)do if d.s+J<u then O(M,d)end end o=M u=u+1 end function T()local c={_=b(4),e=b(8),a=b(12)}local W,X,U=b(16),b(20),b(24)local y=af(W,X,U)return{c=c,y=y,ad=function(G,B)return Z(ak(G.y,B),G.c)end}end function onDraw()local ae,S=k.getWidth(),k.getHeight()k.drawMap(g.c._,g.c.a,v)for Y,d in pairs(o)do local ag,V=map.mapToScreen(g.c._,g.c.a,v,ae,S,d.c._,d.c.a)local ac=al(d.s,0,1,J,1-aa)k.setColor(255,0,255,ac*255)k.drawRectF(ag,V,1,1)end end
